attributes.action: pressure the oil companies to bring petrol prices at the pump in line with current oil prices. This will be one step to create more confidence and bring inflation down.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The oil prices is now very close to where it was a year ago. In comparison to the peak, the oil price has fallen by appr. 40%. However petrol prices at the pump have at best fallen by 10%. We are all worried about inflation and here is an opportunity to help bring inflation down. The higher cost of petrol impact a great number of people and businesses. I fear that if the oil price rises again we may face prices increases on top of the current level. I therefore petition the PM to put pressure on the oil industry to bring petrol prices down in line with input cost.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
